question: An online pharmacy Netmeds has appointed whom as its brand ambassador recently?
explanation: Netmeds has appointed Mahendra Singh Dhoni as its brand ambassador. Netmeds CEO Pradeep Dadha said that, the company wants people to know that it intends to be a team member to help fight Chronic diseases. Netmeds is promoted by Dadha family. At present it has an inventory of 35,000 stock keeping units (SKUs) of prescription drugs and 5,000 SKUs of OTC (Over-The-Counter) products.
